channel.title: Cj'spkscape
channel.description:
- 80% czar - 16% me - 4% moparisthebest.com/smf for various tuts Please comments , good or bad thanks
Used Silabsoft's Client Download link http://www.megaupload.com/?d=PPSQ6BGN
Nothing really special but meh i tried to do something with it , took me a day lol Ok, i wanted to see what i could do with a czar source, so i downloaded a blank czar source and..... - Changed Home - Added new commands - New Smithing Created by me - Fixed Magic timer = less massing = better pking - New shops - Removed everything to do with members - added more to train - added right click Stats menu - Moved Portals - added dbmini - added gsmini - Fixed frozen key portal and made into a minigame ::gmaulmini - Changed all shops and added a bunch of items to them - Moved theiving to home - Changed prices or godswords and Dark bows = higher payout for minigame - Fixed ::pickup, it was the old 1, so only would pickup something with 4 digets - Fixed Flooding on server - and a bunch of other little bugs and glitches, and added tons of new items and updated shops
New Gsmini and Dbmini and gmaulmini Commands (what I have found and ones listed):
Normal Commands ----------------------------------------- food Starter ::rep Namehere home jad wc pk kqueen cather 3rd age capes theive slayer smith mypk Suggest dbmini arrows runes
Mod Commands ------------------------------------------ master pure Noted Barrows god godoff sweet
Admin Commands -------------------------------------------- Pnpc xteletome xteleto banuser unbanuser
Owner Commands ------------------------------------------- eat Reset Namehere ipban
Download link http://www.megaupload.com/?d=PPSQ6BGN

item.title: Cj'spkscape
item.dc:creator: @cj_howat cj_howat@hotmail.com
item.description:
@cj_howat wrote:

Firstly - This is super old and i just released it, Seconds I have never really like anything more than a nicely coded czar because you can code them well and do alot with them , the 1 im doing now i have been working on for 4 months , Czar base , Silab client is really good, and have average 20 - 30 daytime 10 - 20 nighttime? highest was 59 . Mind you everyone says that they love my servers who play it. ill re release my new 1 tommorrow as V2 (heavily coded) thx.

Excuse me now that i noticed? , You have alot of nerve concidering im the Owner and Coder of cjspkzscape, even this this is crappy and such and i have recoded it all in the past 3 months so i can release a awsome server that will make people wanna go back to czar but, proof this is my source that this guy leached off me?

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Nothing really special but meh i tried to do something with it , took me a day lol
Ok, i wanted to see what i could do with a czar source, so i downloaded a blank czar source andâ€¦
